Name: Johnbosco
description:
JohnBosco is the resident of kabale. He is 42 years old. He is married with 4 school aged children. He deals in banana and coffee farming as his main source of income.

His main challenge is limited capital for investment, poor soils and poor production thus low incomes. He is seeking a loan to buy manure and mulches for his plantation to better the soil quality, better his production quality, increase his incomes and better his standards of living.

He will be able to keep his children in school for a brighter future.
